summary: Defines executor classes that implement the core logic for handling DynamoDB update expression actions (SET, ADD, DELETE, REMOVE). Each executor resolves target nodes within an item, validates operand types, and applies the corresponding modification to the inâ€‘memory representation of a DynamoDB item.
business_intent: Allow the Moto DynamoDB mock to accurately parse and apply update expressions during item updates, reproducing the behavior of real DynamoDB for testing purposes.
